caption.p: Schematic diagram of information flow and reporting structure in health facility event‐based surveillance in Yaoundé, Cameroon. CPC, Centre Paseur du Cameroun;Pasteur Center of Cameroon; DLMEP: MINSANTE Direction de la Lutte Contre la Maladie, les Epidémies et les Pandémies; Ministry of Health’s Division for the Fight against Disease, Epidemics and Pandemics; LNSP, Laboratoire National de Sante Publique de Cameroun; Cameroon’s National Public Health Laboratory
